content.question: The map above demonstrates which of the following about the Indian Ocean trade?

choices.label: Monsoons prevented trade from taking place along the East African coast.
Europeans were active in bringing goods from West Africa to the Indian Ocean.
Trade involved most of the regions bordering the Indian Ocean as well as China.
The most important item traded across the Indian Ocean was silk.
Arab and Indian traders were better traders than the Chinese.

content.answer: Trade involved most of the regions bordering the Indian Ocean as well as China.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
